## Biography

Hi, my name is Max (_he/him_) and I am a computational ecologist in the **Biodiversity, Ecology, and Conservation** based at the **International Institute for Applied Systems Analysis (IIASA)**. I am interested in ecological modelling and especially considering the spatial explicit characteristics of most ecological processes.

My research is mainly focused on how we can use spatial patterns to infer the underlying ecological processes. In this context, I mostly use spatial point pattern analysis, individual-based modelling and other modeling techniques. Thus, I am always interested in programming, especially in the _R_ language.

To find more information about myself, please see my [CV](CV.html).
